== Introduction ==
To get the Hercules DJ Consoles working on Ubuntu with programs such as <nowiki>[[http://www.mixxx.org/|Mixxx]]</nowiki> you need to install the third party drivers.

The driver should work for the following controllers:
* Hercules DJ Console RMX
* Hercules DJ Control Steel
* Hercules DJ Console Mk2
* Hercules DJ Control MP3

== Installation ==
=== Ubuntu 10.10, 11.04, 11.10, 12.04 ===
<pre>
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:rojtberg/hdjmod
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install hdjmod-dkms
sudo modprobe hdj_mod
</pre>
=== Manual ===
To download, patch, build and install yourself, you can follow the instructions here: <nowiki>[[http://progressif.tehif.eu/articles/40]]</nowiki>.
